data_conf module¶

class data_node_editor.data_conf.NodeFactory¶

Bases: object

Register of nodes create in sumodules nodes.

Update a dictionary with the class name and the reference to constructor

registered_nodes = {'DataNode_EditableTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table.DataNode_EditableTable'>, 'DataNode_SelectColumns': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.select_columns.DataNode_SelectColumns'>, 'DataNode_Table': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table.DataNode_Table'>, 'OpNode_CastColumns': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.cast_columns.OpNode_CastColumns'>, 'OpNode_ConcatTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_concat.OpNode_ConcatTable'>, 'OpNode_DescribeTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_describe.OpNode_DescribeTable'>, 'OpNode_MeltTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_melt.OpNode_MeltTable'>, 'OpNode_MergeTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_merge.OpNode_MergeTable'>, 'OpNode_PivotTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_pivot.OpNode_PivotTable'>, 'OpNode_ReadCSVFile': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.files.OpNode_ReadCSVFile'>, 'OpNode_TransposeTable': <class 'data_node_editor.nodes.table_transpose.OpNode_TransposeTable'>}¶
